Articles.Content: I'm not sure what's going on, I got a new computer and updated to Windows 8.1 and KSP 0.90 now I cant get Infernal Robotics and Mecjeb to work. I have the parts but the control windows are not showing up. I have the most resent updates for the mods and the parts are there but no controls. As far a IR goes I also installed the most resent tweak scale which also isn't working. The only other mod I have now is KW Rocketry which is fine.
